top_comment.text:
My theory or hope for this new film universe batman:
Bruce wayne is old, grizzled, and is already closely thinking about hanging 
up his cape but only stays because of the emergence of the justice league 
and superman and realizes that the world really needs batman now more than 
ever. Hes already had dick grayson as robin and now nightwing while carrie 
kelly is the second or third robin. Dick's relationship with bruce is 
strained but deep down he thinks of him as a father figure. In the newest 
batman solo film it will emphasize the fact that bruce is just getting too 
old to keep going even with help from carrie and dick. He starts to prepare 
for retirement or even death. 
In the second JL film, he'll sacrifice himself to save the world and in the 
second solo batman film or NIGHTWING film, dick grayson will take up the 
mantle of batman (reluctantly) and will go on to join the justice league 
and be a younger batman for the team. If the movies go in this direction, 
it can deal with the sort of predicament theyve put themselves in through 
making batman a little older. We'll get a new batman and see the first 
legacy character in the DCMU or any love action adaptation.﻿
top_comment.author: Steve Corona

comments.text:
+villa777 well they could just say that he came up with the name by 
himself, i mean its not a very complicated name for someone to just come up 
with while creating a vigilante identity. Most people know nightwing by the 
name anyway and wouldnt need to wonder "howd he come up with the name?"
OR, they could just make dick grayson the robin who died, and the new 
batman will be terry mcginnis, creating a sort of batman beyond thing. Its 
all just theories
comments.author: Steve Corona

comments.text:
What's odd is if Nightwing is in the film, how would he get his name? He 
named himself after a Kryptonian warrior but Batman is just meeting 
Superman for the first time in the film. XD
comments.author: villa777

comments.text:
Hahahh sounds like a Great Idea :D

However I assume they won't go down that way :(

In my opinion an old version of JL would be kinda sad cuz I want to see a 
lovely 2-4 trilogies of JL!
comments.author: Li Cheng

top_comment.text:
It's cool they are having a Robin in the film but I rather see dick Grayson 
Robin or even Tim Drake ﻿
top_comment.author: Jeremy B

comments.text:
+Vindicator73 That's not logic you keep saying it's gonna be a minor role, 
no she'll get a reasonable role not as memorable as the main cast of course 
but don't say it's gonna be a forgettable role, that doesn't hold any logic.
comments.author: Ernest schoenmakers

comments.text:
+Ernest schoenmakers That is not logic, that is just your wishful thinking.

Sucker Punch has nothing to do with this movie. 
Her role would be totally different and in all likelihood less significant 
in B v S.

He might just be doing her a favor by giving her a role at all.....keeping 
her name relevant and hoping this movie pays off bigtime so both he and her 
can makes lots of profit from it.

But its not like this movie desperately needs Jena Malone to be apart of 
it....story wise or to sell it to the audience.

That is logic.

-_-
comments.author: Vindicator73

comments.text:
+Vindicator73 Your conclusion doesn't hold any logic or whatsoever cause 
Zack knows her very well from Sucker Punch, how excellent she was in her 
performance so he surely would give her a memorable role. This is logic.
comments.author: Ernest schoenmakers

comments.text:
+Ernest schoenmakers So its Jena Malone as a blonde? Well that figures 
I guess :)

Its fine if that is your opinion.

But I just have a better understanding of truth it seems.

What's more important to directors, making monetary profit on their work, 
or friendships??

Again I'm sure Jena though good friends is not the only close friend Synder 
has, especially of the female variety.

Its not the end of his world and not the end of her world if they have a 
falling out.

It happens more often than you realize.

But I'm not saying its a lock her role will not be important.

But it simply will not be memorable enough to upstage the main 
actors/characters is all I'm saying.

That only happens if she directly effects the ending.

-_-
comments.author: Vindicator73

comments.text:
+Vindicator73 Really it doesn't make any sense what you're talking about, 
if i were a good friend to you then i wanted you to have a reasonable role 
not just some minor thing, otherwise you'd say well friendship ends all 
here, so i stick to my opinion. 
Who do you think who that smiling girl is, you should know that by now?
comments.author: Ernest schoenmakers

comments.text:
+Ernest schoenmakers Friends come and go,  I would think a smart Zack 
Synder is more concerned with making sure this movie is a hit and the other 
actors carry their weight.

Because a lot is riding on this movie, which will be the first since Man of 
Steel, which many people believe was a movie that got DC new cinematic 
universe off to a slow, less than stellar start.


BTW who is that girl smiling in your avatar?

-_-
comments.author: Vindicator73

comments.text:
+Vindicator73 Of course not what did i tell you, if they're very good 
friends to each other would you give her just a minor role which people 
don't recall anymore after all of this, this doesn't make any sense, then 
i'd say, well some friend.
comments.author: Ernest schoenmakers

comments.text:
+Ernest schoenmakers
In a movie like this with so many other hyped characters.....her role would 
not be that significant or memorable.

People are going to see this movie for Batman, Superman, Aquaman, Wonder 
Woman, Flash, and whether or not this new Luthor turns out good or bad.

Malone, unless she is Batgirl, will be the last thing on people's minds.

-_-
comments.author: Vindicator73

comments.text:
+Vindicator73 You're not thinking either cause if she plays none of these 
roles then it wouldn't be just a minor role,why?Because a good friend Zack 
is to her wouldn't do that, so she'll have a reasonable role.
comments.author: Ernest schoenmakers

comments.text:
Its still not confirmed she is Robin, she could be Batgirl or neither, just 
a citizen who helps in small way.....amazing how stupid people run away 
with rumors to the point of absurdity.
comments.author: Vindicator73

top_comment.text:
Read the comic! The female robin is in it. Get over it. It will be great! 
Get mad at Nolan for not giving u ur fill in his movies. ﻿
top_comment.author: jon edwards

comments.text: TIM DRAKE FOR LIFE!!!!!
comments.author: James Crabbe

comments.text: NEVER!!!!!
comments.author: James Crabbe

top_comment.text:
I still like Carrie Kelly but, she was very annoying. Just really didn't 
have any fight game. Any Robin could take on Deathstroke. Most of them 
would lose. But they could take him on. 

Carrie Kelly would die from fight Killer Croc. Lol. Now that's saying 
something. ﻿
top_comment.author: James Crabbe

comments.text: +James Crabbe You're a strange guy, i'm not following you.
comments.author: Ernest schoenmakers

comments.text: I have friends that I like that are annoying too.
comments.author: James Crabbe

comments.text:
You like Carrie Kelley but she's annoying, what's it gonna be, like or 
dislike????
comments.author: Ernest schoenmakers

top_comment.text:
I did not care about Batman v Superman. But now that I know Jena Malone 
will be in it as Robin I am interested. I really like how she was in sucker 
punch. Her as Rocket, Vanessa Hudgens as Blondie and Jamie Chung as Amber 
did a very  good job at being bad ass, sexy and expressing feelings. I 
found their character to be more real as a person than Sweet Pea and Baby 
Doll.

So now I am into the idea of watching batman vs superman. I have no faith 
in the other actors for this movie to pull it off. I did not like the new 
superman the way it was done and the lack of depth of the characters and 
the vilains. I also think that the choice of the actor for Lex Luthor is 
rather lame.

Looking foward to see Aquaman on the other hand. That actor LOOKS and ACTS 
BADASS.﻿
top_comment.author: ravenandthecrow

comments.text:
Oh man i love you cause you're saying what i always was saying to people 
who dislike her, Jena Malone is an actress with range and the same goes for 
JLaw.
comments.author: Ernest schoenmakers

comments.text:
I totally agree. Her acting had also more emotional range.

Just looking at hear facial expression and body language it was easy to see 
what the character was feeling and thinking.

She was a very real and believable character.

Hollywood should invest more on these talented actors than some big names 
that have the same face and perhaps just one or two emotions which remains 
the same in ALL of their movies.

Malone is totally underrated
comments.author: ravenandthecrow

comments.text:
I fully agree with you and let's just say that Jena Malone was the best of 
the young girls in Sucker Punch.
comments.author: Ernest schoenmakers

top_comment.text:
People think they are changing Robin into a girl. There was a girl Robin in 
this comic but no one's heard of her because no one likes her. She was just 
annoying. ﻿
